getTypeDistance

public int getTypeDistance(LuaState luaState,
                           int index,
                           java.lang.Class<?> formalType)
Description copied from interface: Converter
Returns the type distance between a Lua value and a formal Java type. Distances are comparable for the same Lua value only. If a Lua value cannot be converted to the specified formal type, the method returns Integer.MAX_VALUE.

Specified by:
getTypeDistance in interface Converter
Parameters:
luaState - the Lua state
index - the stack index containing the value
formalType - the formal Java type
Returns:
the type distance, or Integer.MAX_VALUE if the conversion is not supported

convertLuaValue

public <T> T convertLuaValue(LuaState luaState,
                             int index,
                             java.lang.Class<T> formalType)
Description copied from interface: Converter
Converts a Lua value to a Java object of the specified formal type.

If the Lua value is nil, the method returns null.

Specified by:
convertLuaValue in interface Converter
Parameters:
luaState - the Lua state
index - the stack index containing the value
formalType - the formal Java type
Returns:
the Java object, or null

convertJavaObject

public void convertJavaObject(LuaState luaState,
                              java.lang.Object object)
Description copied from interface: Converter
Converts a Java object to a Lua value and pushes that value on the stack.

If the object is null, the method pushes nil.

Specified by:
convertJavaObject in interface Converter
Parameters:
luaState - the Lua state
object - the Java object, or null
